tool.name: Convert XMFA to BigWig track

param.name: sequences
param.label: Select sequences used in progressiveMauve alignment
param.help: Should be provided in the same order as in original progressiveMauve run

param.name: window_size
param.label: Default window size for BigWig files

tool.help:
What it does ============
XMFA Alignments are great, but now you need a way to visualize this data!
This tool provides a conversion step to BigWig data, which is easy to view in JBrowse.
Please note:
- the "parent" genome should be first. - that it expects a single fasta file provided which should contain the genomes in the same order they were run with progressiveMauve.
